dmca.title: KaZaA  Owner Complains to Google (#3)
dmca.body:
September 12, 2003

VIA FEDERAL EXPRESS AND EMAIL

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, California 94043
[private]@[private].com

RE: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

Ladies and Gentlemen:

We act on behalf of Sharman Networks, Ltd. (the "Owner").

As required under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C.
